entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as saying 'It's got to be me' and handing back a stock.

entities.name: puddlemere united
entities.description: Puddlemere United is a Quidditch team. Harry denies supporting them, saying 'And that's not mine, I don't support Puddlemere United'.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a character in the story. She has a casual tone and mentions Bill and Fleur's wedding.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as getting married to Fleur. He is likely Mrs Weasley's son, given the context of the story.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as getting married to Bill. She is likely a witch and a member of the wizarding community.

relationships.description: Harry denies supporting Puddlemere United, indicating a dislike for the team.
Mrs Weasley mentions Bill's wedding, suggesting that she is his mother or parent.
Given the context of the story, Mrs Weasley is likely Fleur's mother-in-law, as she mentions Bill and Fleur's wedding.
